well today i got to sleep lol it was fun i slept tell 1230 it was fun then i got up and got somethin 2 eat and called Sarah and she was going shopping with her mom so she said she would call me back .... so i cleaned the garage and went and got on the computer to look at buying me one of my own and my search was a sucess i found a few ... so i will look more after i get my check friday im excited lol ....  i owe my dad though so yeah .... neways after that i got on the fone and talked a lil while to sarah ... then i got off to go to my memas and talk to her and check up on them and get my stuff i had left , then i came home then i got on the fone some more  and then i went to get me a shower and i got my shower  then i came back to my room and laid down and called sarah then well thats now im talking to sarah ... yeah well schools tomorrow and im excited i get to see sarah  and will get to see her every day yeah!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! lol

 

well this is more important :

today is me and sarahs 2 month 2 weeks ... and im falling more i love with her every day i love her w/ all my heart she is the most beautiful most sweet smart , loving caring person i have ever been with  i love her so much ... i cant see an end in sight  i know this is just the beging and yet im so in love ...  and belive me i love her so much its so tuff to leave her when im with her ....  i just want to hold her in my  arms i would  go to the end of the earth for her i love her

 

well im going 2 bed

 

laterz

pat

well i went 2 bed at 2 and woke up at 7 to take the asvap test and its so weird cuz i took it so easy cuz i didnt try  cuz i didnt care and i got one of the highest scores in the last 3 years so yeah i was confused so know every service is gonna call and try to get me to join but i dont know if im gonna lol i dont think so ... lol then i went home and did my stuff around here and back to work i left about 4 and i got home at 10 ... so im kinda tired lol ... its ok though im now sittin on the fone with the most wonderful girl in the world i love her so much she has got 2 be the best girl anyone could ask for i know it i love her 

well thats it!!! its kinda short but yeah im tired lol late

well....
today was great i got up about 11 and took my lil pain in the butt brother to get his hair cut after that we went to my mema's house for a sec then came home and i ploished up my room  and cleaned the kitchen so that was lame but it got better my dad came home and told me i could go to sarah so it took me all of two seconds to run to my truck and take off lol then when i got there i was instantly in a better place man o'man i love sarah so much she is so perfect for me she keeps me the happiest i have ever been i have never felt so much for one person and she has defently earned my love lol ... like she needed to ... i knew from the first day when me and justin rolled up at her house that i liked her and i wanted to be with her and i was determented so i got what i wanted !! lol i think she wanted it too lol whats so kewl about her is i can open up to her  and not be worried about if she is gonna say somethin or make fun of me ... cuz i trust her so much its easy for me to tell her anything and i have to thank her for that ... we talked for six hours last night and i opened up so much i told her stuff i have never told anyone ... she is just the most perfect girl for me ... well im gonna go laterz

well i woke up at 630 with a 101 temp man i was hot and had a head ache . not a good way to start the day i just didnt feel good .. then i went to work .. it wasnt to bad the people down there are pretty kewl and i just hang out stock and play with stuff and blow ballons its not to bad and i get payed for it so hey couldnt be to bad huh ? lol then i went to see sarah and celbrate .. so u guys no its national kiss day .. lol i got mine as i told her i would .. but the funny thing is that we both felt like crap but we will get better i know it .. then i went home layed on the bed with the lil stuffed animal puppys she gave me and fell asleep , works everytime , i love that thing .. cuz its from her ...  then i wopke up got in the net for a bit and went to watch tv and back to bed lol with my stuffed friend  then woke up and here i am ... well here is somethin u all should read : 



I don't wanna rush this thing
I don't really wanna jump the gun
I really wanna say those three little words
But I'm gonna bite my tongue

Yeah, I'm just gonna lay on back
Leave it on cruise control
I'm gonna hold it all inside
Till the right time comes down the road

Chorus:

My head's a reelin'

It's more than a notion
It starts with an "I"
And ends with a "U"

Are you feelin' it too

I guess I've all but said it now
So much for hopin' you'd go first
Don't leave me hangin' out here on a line
Baby, it's your turn
Say you could sleep last night
Swore that you could feel me breathe
Had you wantin' me right there by your side
Yeah, baby I know what you mean

Second Chorus:

My heads a reelin'

It starts with an "I"
And ends with a "U"

You're feelin' it too

Bottle up emotion
It's more than a notion
It starts with an "I"
And ends with a "U"
I got a feelin'
You're feelin' it too
You're feelin' it too
Yeah, you're feelin' it too
Feelin' it too
Oh, Yeah

 thoughs are the lyrics to the best song in the world ... it is the most important song to me , that is me and sarahs song ... i love sarah so much she means the world to me ... u guys have no idea ... everyday i find somethin new out and every day i fall deeper and deeper in love with her... she makes me smile no matter what she is the girl in my dreams i swear ... 

babe ... if this is you ... I just want to say .. thank you !! you make me smile and make me feel as if im always loved and i have someone to love u mean the worl i love u so much ..

we g2g late

well today was my b-day and to tell u guyz the truth i thought it was gonna suck cuz all of my family is out i didnt hang out wuth friends so yeah i thought it would bite but ... I WAS SO WRONG ... IT WAS THE BEST B-DAY I HAVE EVER HAD

ok let me start out today about 9 o' clock and got a shower and ate and went and picked up sarah ... so we could  get our schedules .. man o ' man it was hot ... i was like so drained and sarah almost colapses on me so she sat down when we were finally at the front lol its ok she is good now . she gave me a lil scare ... i dont wanna lose he she means a bunch ... then we went to sonic and got some drinks and fries for her made her feel better ... then we went back to her house and layed around it was fun , and then i had to leave cuz i was coming back in like 3 and 1/2 hours to take her to dinner and so i left went home and jumped in the shower ...  and layed around for a lil while to rest .. it was worth it ... and then i got up and got dressed and did my hair and brushed my teach ... i wanted to look good for her tonight ... and then i checked up on justin and seen him in a while then went to get sarah , she wasnt ready when i got there but it is ok by me so i sat for a bit then she was done and we went to olive garden ... it was awesome lol i like good food ... then we went to blockbuster and rented Godsend ... so then we went back there and watched tv for a bit and put the movie in but its strange i only saw parts of it... it didnt make since ... but anyways we just kinda layed around after words ... it was so much fun ... i love  her so much she is the best thing in my life i feel bad for all u chumps that dont have her ..u r missing out she is the best girl any guy could have and i love her to death

well g2g 

bye

p.s I LOVE SARAH ROSS

well i know i havent updated in a while i have been at bootcamp for all who didnt know , it was a differnt experience ... i delt with rape , suicide and fighting and just too much drama ... im serious about all of that ... it was differnt and all that crap while i was sleep deprived  but o' well ... the food was ok i think lol ... but man o man i missed alot ... my friend jason got a job and will get his licence soon like thew 26th ... i got my cell fone back and the ablity to drive YAHOO!!!  i got to stay home from the bogus trip that my family took and got to stay with my mema and buddy which is great cuz they dont make me do anything ... lol im a happy camper ... and the greatest news yet ..........................................

YESTERDAY was me and sarahs two months ... im so unbelivably happy with her and happy becuz she is the first girl that i have made it this long with ... and actually had a great relationship NO FIGHTS what so ever ... i think thats a good thing lol new record ... she is so trully amazing my summer would be the worst ever with out her ... she is what keeps me going sometimes and im the happiest i have ever been ... its amazing i can lay there and be the happiest just layin somewhere holding her in my arms ... and i could fall asleep  and if i didnt wake up o' well i would be the happiest just cuz im with her ... when i kiss her it feels as if its the first kiss all over and i see fireworks lol and i dont mean the cheap ones u find at the stands ... i mean like grand-fanally fireworks ... and every time i see her i fall in love over and over , deeper and deeper, and its the greatest feeling i have ever know ... i feel bad for all who dont feel what i feel ... u guyz are missing out ... i dont wanna rub it it lol ... just know im the happiest i have ever been and i dont think i could get much happier ...

if this is sarah ... i love you with all my heart!!!! babe u are the greatest thing in the world to me ... u know how i feel ... i love to hear ur voice ur kiss ... to hear our song ... u r just trully amazing u r the only girl i have ever loved this much .. u put a smile a cross my face no matter what situation i love to be with u all the time ... if im not with u im thinkin about u , i dream about u ... u r the girl of my dreams .... THANKS SO MUCH

well laterz all ...

pat

well im here at bootcamp ... and im sneaking on the computer ... but it will work lol i wont get caught ... i have got 20 hours of sleep since sunday ... so im a lil tired ... i have been working so much yet i still have lil amounts of time ... i had time to day i broke down i miss sarah so much she is the love of my life. i hope im with her for as long as she will have me lol ... well so u guys no im not in bootcamp i running the show im the guost watch ... meaning im the watch officer from 8 at night tell 8 in the morning then im fill in watch the rest of the time ... so yeah not much watch ... 
i made a couple buddies up here that are helpin me out ... all i know is the moment i get back im going to sarahs cuz i cant last much longer with out her ... 


well im gonna go late 

i love sarah ross ...

well today started early i went to work down at the sherriffs department at 0700 am and then i got off around 0100 pm  then i came home and went to work cleaning the whole side yard so i can c sarah tomorrow . and it was 107 degrees it was so damn hot and i was bustin my ass and then my dad came home and started yellin cuz i was working to hard whatever that means ?  so he got made cuz i wouldnt stop ... i just get to the point if im going to do it im going to do it all  at once and not stop in go it takes to long and im sa lazy person so if im doing dont interupt ... well then he decided to pick up the Generader and move it my be will he let go to early and droped it on my toe , yeah the same toe that i had surgery on ... that is barely healing .. yeah that one ..  it hurt like a s.o.b it split everything that was healed back open it sucks ... well if u guys dont know generators are about 250 lbs. and well im not to big but he made me pick it up and when i did i pulled my groin muscle ohh that was a new type of pain i had'nt felt b4 ...  but ohh well now i just cant lift my left leg very high ... well thats the end of my day ....

 

but i was doing alot of thinking today  and sarah kept coming to mind like normal ... i wasnt tying to think of her she just always is on the brain.. and well i thought of all the reasons i am so madly in love with her ...

1. the way she smiles at me

2. the face she makes when i goto kiss her ...

3. the incredible feeling i get when i hold her

4. the even better feeling i get when i kiss her

9.   the way i can just look at her and be the happiest i have ever been ...

14 . the easieness i  have to talk to her ... its never acquired

15. the fact that she takes over my head and i love it ...

16. the specail feeling i get when i hear her voice

if i kept going u would take dayz to read this ... im promise so we will just go to the last one ....

i dont know whats going on today ... i havent been like this ever .... it hit me so hard today i miss sarah so much ... it made me sick to my stomach all day it may me sick three times to where i was huging the toilet bowl for a while ... and i just dont know it seems like everything i see or hear reminds me of her ... its so sad i just hit me so hard , i know with all my heart i love her so much and it would really set me back if i lost her she seriously one of the only reasons i have kept going this summer , she is the reason my summer isnt the worst ever . she is so awesome it drives me crazy when i cant see her . i seriously woke up this morning in tears cuz i miss her so much i long to be able to hold her in my arms again or just be able to sit on the fone with her and laugh .. i hear our song all the time ... and it brings me two feelings at once , one that is a good one and makes me think of how lucky i am to have her and the other is sadness that makes me wish i was there with her , i read her letters al day over and over and just kept looking at her pictures this is driving me crazy i am to the point i dont care if im grounded i have to c her and hold her again before i leave.... i dont know what im going to ... i cant eat cuz im tired of huging the toilet dont get me wrong the toilet is nice but not for me to hug ... so i dunno im just seriously missing her so much , i love her ... and i dont think i have cared this much before in all seriousness , she is the best thing to happen to me ever .... well i dont feel good ttyl ...

well my day was pretty un eventful ... i woke up to put my foot in a boiling hot think of water with medicine cuz i was supposed to have surgery today but nope that didnt happen they cant get me in tell tuesday at 8 o' clock at night , how fun . lol that dosent give me but four dayz to recover before i have to go down and staff bootcamp . so yeah its gonna be great . then im going in sane cuz i miss sarah , she is so perfect , i think god made her for me and i hope i do the same for her .. i sat around alot cuz i cant walk bearly , and two songs ran thru my head all day one is " you are the love of my life " and i have no idea who sings that . and the other is the greatest song in the world by Billy Currington, "I have a feeling" , thats me and sarahs song , besides that up nothin really happen .... we got bright house network today .  lotz of channels ... ohh yeah highlight of my day my mommy let me talk 2 sarah for like 10 minutes that was heaven... lol , well thats is for now , just one last thing

well this is the first time im have written in a couple dayz i have been in Nevada ... Utah .. and arizona , with my family it sucks ... i get annoyed easily with them , i dont know y , i just do .  so i tried to be on my best behavior i could but it was hard i missed sarah so bad i love her so much u guyz have no idea. she seriously has taken my heart, well so on the last 2 dayz  i was being a very happy kid and helping alot so when i got home i got to go to sarahs and see her , so they trip was a long one but no less then 15 minutes after i got home i was of to sarahs ... when i got there i was suprised to see her run out of her house to see me ... lol ... it was great ... i have never seen her run , and she ran for me ... i love her so much .. i couldnt wait to see her ... so when i got there we went and hung out in her room for a while then her sis came in and bugged cuz she wanted food so i took her and sarah to sonic and got food then came back for like 10 seconds then went to allisons to drop off a card for her b-day ... then we stayed the for like 30 min. and then went to sarahs and i left my cell at allisons so we had to turn round and go back then we went to McDonalds .. and my buddy nick hooked me up with my free drink ... lol im was happy about that , then we went to her house and layed around  and i was truly the happiest just to lay there and hold her in my arms ... but then i got this text from my dad saying " mom needs her car " and this was like at 8 so i was like huh its 8 why "does she need it ?"   but they made me come home and i got in the front door and they started screeming and i passed out ... then i woke up  and they put me on the couch and kelp yelling ... and im in so much trouble ... i dont have a fone anymore .. no tv not internet ... ( im sneaking on right now ) no driving , they are making me sleep in there room or i have to wake them up every hour and tell them im there and i havent run away ... there so dumb ,

all i know is that i love SARAH ROSS with all my heart i have never felt like this ... and i dont wanna lose her cuz she means so much 2 me . she is the only thing keeping me going thru all of this ... she is so amazing ,  she keeps me happy and she just is the best thing in my life , i honestly understand love , becuz when the feeling i have with sarah i havent been bored we dont fight at all ... and i smile when i hear her voice when i see her ... she is just the perfect girl for me ... and i love her

well g2g ,

Pat

1.
